text_re: “The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.”
text: “The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.”

text_re: “It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.”
text: “It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.”

text_re: “There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.”
text: “There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.”

text_re: “The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid.”
text: “The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid.”

text_re: “Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.”
text: “Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.”

text_re: “Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.”
text: “Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.”

text_re: “It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.”
text: “It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.”

text_re: “I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.”
text: “I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.”

text_re: “A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water.”
text: “A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water.”

text_re: “A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.”
text: “A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.”
